website_summaries.verdict: A colorful wooden puzzle with a unique shape, intricate pieces, and a satisfying outcome.
pros: Individual pieces have distinct nature-themed shapes for added interest (wildlife, trees, and so on)
Laser-cut wooden pieces are sturdy and beautiful
Seller makes several other puzzle images as well
cons: Pricier than the average jigsaw puzzle

customer_reviews.title: Immersive work of art!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful wooden owl puzzle! More like an immersive work of art. Each piece placed expands on the main image of the owl and also creates a starlit landscape filled with wildlife and plants in the cut lines of the puzzle. What it lacks in difficulty to put together, it more than makes up for in overall enjoyment of the meditative practice of seeing the connections and shapes form as one places each new puzzle piece.
customer_reviews.author: goatface

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for a gift! Puzzle made with incredible attention to details. I love this tiny pieces 😍
customer_reviews.author: Sv_simply

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. We loved putting it together. Well packaged and high quality. It is hard enough to be a challenge but easy enough to complete in an evening.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my laser-cut wooden puzzle collection!
customer_reviews.text: I collect and work enjoy wooden puzzles for their beauty and theIr intricate pieces. The owl puzzle was an absolute joy from the clever wooden box it arrived in to the finished product with all its delightful plant and animal shaped whimsies. The lid with its picture of the completed puzzle comes with a stand for easy referencing. Quality is outstanding. I am already saving up for the wolf puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brook

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Beautiful Puzzle - Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was the coolest puzzle I have ever seen. The craftmanship was truly amazing, even down to the wooden box that it came in. The individual pieces are so creative, with the different animal shapes, and colors. I have been wanting this puzzle for about 6 months and finally decided to buy it. 100% worth the money! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I love this puzzle so much. I ordered 3 more of these wood puzzles from Unidragon and will treasure them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it, but she has still yet to put it together. Why you ask, because she loves to get “stuff” but never put together her stuff. Looks like I’ll be doing the puzzle for her and putting it up on the wall. I should have married up!
customer_reviews.author: Theadore-Rex

customer_reviews.title: These puzzles are amazing
customer_reviews.text: The art work is beautiful, it was a challenge to complete, but full of fun surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lautenbach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Puzzle Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom for her birthday. She LOVES it. She said it was sturdy and beautiful. She is planning on framing the puzzle. I guess I know what I'll be giving her for her future birthdays!
customer_reviews.author: Becca Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very COOL
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool piece and would be a great gift. My uncle got me the owl and the chameleon. We almost have the owl put together. We thought it would come with a little book, but it didnt. Over all pleased with product.... you have to get the puzzle pieces in there just right because of the weird shapes, once you get a section going it doesnt take long to piece it together. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Maddison H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality puzzle. Thoughtfully and imaginatively designed. One of the most fun puzzles I have done!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this puzzle for myself. It was one of the most enjoyable puzzles I've ever done. I like that some little pieces are in the shape of animals and leaves mushrooms etc. I kept all those pieces to one side and put them in the puzzle last. This made the puzzle a little bit more challenging but more interesting. Puzzle very thoughtfully designed even with some hidden surprises that I am sure some people will not discover even after they have put it together. I have since bought two more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: wanda h

customer_reviews.title: Love this puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is everything it's touted to be and more. It's fun, beautiful, and made with quality materials. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Centavo

customer_reviews.title: So fun to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing design, incredible artistry.. the puzzle pieces were so intricate and a delight to put together. We recieved so many complements on the puzzle!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a birthday gift. I love puzzles and have collected some unique ones along the way... Let's just say, 2020 allowed me time to redo some of my favorites. My family saw Unidragon in an ad on fb and then on Amazon and knew I would like it. The pieces are intricate, so it's more challenging than it looks and the added whimsy of the puzzle shapes telling the story of the animal's home added to the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Golden's mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Loved completing this puzzle, the color is amazing and I loved the whimsical animal pieces. Excellent craftsmanship. I would love to have another but not at that cost or more for a bigger puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design with brilliant colors and finish. The animal shaped pieces are a very unique feature. More challenging than the piece count would suggest, but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Rico Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter and she is loving it! The puzzle pieces are adorable and the top of the box has an attachment to stand up for reference. Pricey but much better than cardboard pieces. Home run!
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: A quality really different puzzle experience!
customer_reviews.text: What a gorgeous puzzle. Not for the weak at heart. I LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Taylor Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! Each piece is crafted with so much details and care. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab Soyfoo

customer_reviews.title: Good puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Received item in good condition. Can’t wait to start fixing the puzzles
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fong

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quality & challenging puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous, high quality wooden puzzle. Colors are beautifully vibrant and puzzle is challenging due to the unique puzzle piece shapes. Even the storage box the puzzle arrives in is very nice quality. Love it! This was a good purchase I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NSE

customer_reviews.title: Daughter really enjoyed this puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 year old really liked putting this together....actually put it together twice the first week she had it. Only comment she had was she wished we had purchased the large one!
customer_reviews.author: cmacmt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a gift and the recipient loved it! Said it was 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Sana Davis

customer_reviews.title: We loved this work of art!
customer_reviews.text: We marveled at the craftsmanship. How in the world did they make these intricate pieces? Amazing. We are jigsaw puzzle addicts and our son bought us this one. What a wonderful, thoughtful gift. Normally, I give my puzzles to goodwill when I'm done, but this ones a keeper. I loved how the little pieces were also animals and such. Plus... I loved the design on our owl. Exquisite.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Jarvis Genger

customer_reviews.title: A thoughtful give for someone special
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium Charming Owl puzzle for my wife after seeing a video ad for Unidragon show up on my Facebook timeline. The puzzle looked very unique and she loves owls. It’s presented in a nice wood box. Inside, wrapped in a burlap piece of fabric, were all the wooden puzzle pieces. They fit nicely together and the puzzle had no missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most wonderful puzzle ever
customer_reviews.text: Superb craftsmanship. This would be a good gift even for people who don't normally do puzzles. The other reviews have said it all, but it is spectacular. The pieces are thick, intricate, and perfectly cut. Each little piece is a different shape -- animals, feathers, stars, etc. Even the backs of the pieces are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: pwili

customer_reviews.title: Delightful puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I received the medium owl for Mother's Day and it was great to receive as a gift! The presentation of the puzzle was classic with the beautiful wooden box, the fragrant aroma from the wooden pieces and the lovely way the lid became the puzzle guide. I so enjoyed putting the puzzle together. I had such a great time, I ordered the lion as a birthday gift for my brother who is into woodworking. It was really cool that some of the pieces had animals created from their shapes. Really unique!
customer_reviews.author: Kent B

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with these puzzles!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these puzzles! This is my second one and I absolutely love them! I was so excited when I received my first puzzle, the wolf. I sat down and put it together in one sitting. I was incredibly upset when I finished it, only to find that there was a piece missing. I immediately contacted the company by email and they promptly sent a replacement. I highly recommend!!! The pieces are so unique, and the quality of the puzzle is excellent. I also love the smell of the wood while I am putting it together. I promise you won’t be disappointed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Skye Esry

customer_reviews.title: As well made and fun as the high end heirloom wooden puzzles I inherited.
customer_reviews.text: I received a king sized, 331 piece “Shining Fish” puzzle for my 63rd birthday. I have been doing wooden jigsaw puzzles for nearly 60 years, and the craftsmanship of this puzzle rivals those that my family bought from high end retailers like FAO Schwartz a half decade ago. I had been disappointed with the wooden puzzles that I have bought intermittently over the past 30 years. Craftsmanship and attention to detail had been going down exponentially over the years, until now. This product is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schymik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, intricate, fun shaped pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed both of these puzzles very much! Beautifully packaged and precisely cut. Collectors items! Only wish I had ordered a medium size for the fish. Completed it in a couple of hours. Still challenging but over too soon! Takes manual dexterity as pieces have to placed precisely. ❤️🧩
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Best puzzle you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love these puzzles! Bought one on recommendation of a coworker and am totally addicted. First one arrived and my kids (I had bought it for myself!) immediately were like “WHAT IS THAT AND CAN I DO IT RIGHT NOW!?!???!” So I had to buy several more. Very fun to take on cabin trips. Bought a couple for my parents who are retired and bored in quarantine and they keep asking for me to send them more! Could not be more satisfied with a puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: James Peykanu

customer_reviews.title: This IS art !
customer_reviews.text: This Fox puzzle is an absolutely beautiful piece of art ! The colors are so vibrant, the pieces so intricately cut, the picture of the fox, which has a stand looks 3D when you look at it a few minutes ! And when finished, the puzzle itself has a 3-D look, also. While 195 pieces doesn't sound challenging, it is. Fun to do. Lovely end product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Riley

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Artistic Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so taken with this puzzle, that he wishes to do more! The beauty of the puzzle attracted him at first, however as he got into the puzzle and discovered the intricate nature of the pieces, the hidden animals and birds, the images on the back as well as the front, he was totally intrigued. The design is exquisite and incredibly clever. This is a top quality wooden puzzle to be treasured. Thank you for your top notch design and beautiful work. Colleen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pricey as Admission to Theme Parks
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and intricate puzzle; it is actually more a work of art. If you want a very special gift for someone, this is definitely worth considering. It is 101 pieces, and it only took me about 45 minutes to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Butler

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle, lots of fun. The box is just as beautiful and can be displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Wooden Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I received this puzzle as a gift. The box that it came in was really nice. Beautiful colors of the Wolf. A little challenging but completed in one day. Well made. Thought I would buy this for other family members until I saw the price. (Rather expensive.)
customer_reviews.author: DML

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best puzzle I’ve ever done. There was one small broken piece however I reached out and they quickly sent me a replacement. Great customer service. I need more of these awesome puzzles in my life. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Love this puzzle great quality and quick delivery. Definitely will buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Love this puzzle. Hubby bought it for me as a birthday gift and I finished it in one day (the medium size 187 pieces 8.3x13.8) beautiful colors and I love all the shaped pieces. There’s lots a little owl pieces, bear, deer, bunny. Just thought that was really cute
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Puzzle and packaging is very good quality and fun to work. Shipping time and notifications were a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality wooden puzzle, intricate and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to put together. Love the intricate piece designs, especially the animal shapes, like hidden Easter eggs, Vibrant colors. Nice wood. Can’t wait to do another one! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this puzzle (I did the medium owl) was awesome, from it's packaging to each piece. It was a joy to do this puzzle and I'm still marveling at the fit of each flawlessly cut piece! A beautiful keepsake!
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph D.

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH
customer_reviews.text: My husband was delighted with this novel and enchanting wooden puzzle. It kept him busy for a whole day! The craftmanship is top notch and the packaging for the puzzle is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Grace H.

customer_reviews.title: Charming Owl puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Piece of art, beautiful wooden owl puzzle! Fun to solve, pleasure to look at, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Andrushchenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome puzzle
customer_reviews.text: The vibrant colors are very nice. The animal shapes all around very neat puzzle
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gertsch

product_meta.title: Unidragon Wooden Jigsaw Puzzles - Unique Shape Jigsaw Pieces Best Gift for Adults and Kids Charming Owl 8.3 × 13.8 in (21 × 35 cm) – M
product_meta.description:
Jigsaw puzzles aren’t just for kids.

If you’re looking for a fun way to train and challenge your brain, there’s no better option than solving a good jigsaw puzzle. This classic hobby is great at improving your short term memory, problem solving skills, and attention to detail.

Aside from that, puzzles can also help you unwind after a long day at work. It’s an effective stress reliever for when you want a quick break from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Whether you’re an avid puzzler or trying it out for the first time, we offer an extensive selection for you to choose from.

Enjoy a relaxing time solving these Wooden Jigsaw Puzzles by Unidragon!

Let your mind wander to tranquil grasslands and verdant forests with these puzzle sets! Every piece of our wooden puzzles has a distinct nature-themed shape, from various types of wildlife to trees and nuts. When finished, they create a breathtakingly beautiful work of art that you can hang in your living room.

These intricately detailed pieces have been laser-cut to ensure smooth edges that fit perfectly together, but without any burnt laser marks. The gorgeous prints and bright colors will not fade even after repeated handling of the pieces, ensuring that your puzzle set will look pristine for a long time.

Our puzzles are fun for the whole family! Solving a puzzle together is a great bonding experience, so why not introduce your kids to the wonderful world of jigsaw puzzles? This is an excellent choice for family game nights.

Why else should you choose our puzzles?

✅ Available in four unique designs
✅ Fully recyclable packaging
✅ Thoughtful gift for every occasion

Look forward to hours of entertainment. Add these Wooden Jigsaw Puzzles by Unidragon to your cart TODAY!
feature_bullets: 🌳 NATURE THEMED PUZZLE SET - Enjoy a relaxing time with this Charming Owl puzzle! Available in 4 variations, our wooden jigsaw puzzles are made up of pieces shaped like forest animals and trees.
🌳 GORGEOUS COLORS & DETAILS - Our product boasts rich print quality and intricate laser-cut pieces. When your wood puzzle is complete, you can hang it up on the living room as a classy decoration.

🌳 FUN FOR ALL AGES - Let your kids or parents train their problem solving and thinking skills with this wooden puzzle, or use it as a way to relieve stress after a long day at work. It's great for the whole family!
🌳 A GIFT EVERYONE WILL LOVE - Looking for a thoughtful birthday or holiday present? These wooden unique jigsaw puzzles are the perfect choice! Give your loved ones hours of entertainment.
🌳 SATISFACTION ASSURED - Buy with confidence! Every purchase is backed by our 30 Day Money Back Guarantee. If there are any missing or damaged pieces, contact us for a full refund or replacement.
